name: Hoverdude
description:
You are Hoverdude a little jetpack wielding spaceman who needs to pass all the obstacles to reach the end of all the rooms.

Play through 20 exiting levels and master Hoverdude.

Dev message:
29-1-2020 Most of the game is finished but it will get at least one more update with new and improved sounds. This will come out somewhere in the coming weeks. Thanks for your patience.
